content: also the situation in foxhole got crazy not the tanking but me and vlad got accused of DESTROYING TANKS??? and poor marcus got very worried, told him to redirect the guy to me since im the problem apperently, and he was polish so it went smooth... but still... we grab cutlers to destory craned battle tank... and my boy marcus got tangled into things he shouldn't clearly got worried too much... SO MARCUS MADE A GC WITH THE GUY god and he invaited alll of us and the guy 8 to 2 like on god the gc was so fucking retared like my fucking god but in the end i told the guy that if i was to destroy i wouldn't even leave a name and if i was to destory i wouldn't have enough rpgs and i would get weapon locked and my activity log is clear cuz i only partisant so like i have nothing... he gave up so it's all good but... poor marcus it lives rent free in his head
